https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qiFmLdWJwvIA1tlwerUWBkG2du3.jpg A gang of child-snatching mobsters make a fatal mistake when they kidnap the Waka Stars, a team of pint-sized kung-fu masters who soon turn their cunning wits and deadly skills upon their captors. Crazy World
